column2: Prohibits public posting, printing on ID cards, mailing in window evenlopes, or sending unencrypted over internet.

column1: Washington My Health My Data Act
column2: Protects non-HIPAA health data. Restricts geofencing. Private Right of Action.
Prohibits genetic discrimination in employment/insurance. Private Right of Action.
Prohibits geofencing around healthcare facilities (within **1,850 feet**) for ads/profiling.
Non-gov entities need court order w/ 'compelling interest' to access e-book viewing data.
Requires high privacy defaults & DPIAs for services likely accessed by children.

column1: New York SAFE For Kids Act
column2: Bans 'addictive feeds' for minors w/o parental consent. Restricts notifications 12am-6am.
Requires **warrant** for electronic communications access (email, location).
Strict consent for biometrics. Private Right of Action. 2024 amendment: One violation per person (not per scan).
Now explicitly includes **electronic signatures** as valid written release.
Prohibits use in **hiring process** without applicant consent.
Regulates 'High-Risk' AI systems making consequential decisions (hiring/lending).
Requires **Annual Bias Audits** for AI hiring tools.
Stricter than GLBA. Requires Opt-In for sharing with unaffiliated third parties.
Centralized deletion mechanism. 2028: Independent audits every 3 years. Penalty: $200/day.
First state data broker law. Requires annual registration, security program, free credit freezes.
